synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involved mixing lithium sulfide, phosphorus pentasulfide, and lithium iodide in specific proportions, mechanically milling the mixture in a planetary ball mill under argon atmosphere, confirming the formation of sulfide glass by X-ray measurement, determining the crystallization temperature (Tc) at 189°C, and heat-treating the electrolyte precursor at 210°C for 2 hours to obtain a heat-treated solid electrolyte.
